title: Hi im Hoky
body:
Hi, buy my new book...


Hoky an lux on a beach.

its all good. just $4 at black books. buy it.

thanks for the support?

replies.body:
Ok, so right now, I was lux top in norms, I got devil Tmo to go against, ez
I keep him under my tower and poke him down thinking ohh yeah... lee sin will come

but then tmo gave and backed, I pushed lane eating all the shrooms then backed as well.
I TP to lane like perfect and controlled the wave while again poking down the devil, knowing that
lee could come and take over...but tmo and his team 4 man'ed me took my tower and the game 
was lost, 


Hoky thinks that If you freeze your wave close to tower too long with out a good team 
you may have problems.?

thanks for your help.
driest boards this side oh the internetz.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
